name: AnotherPirateGame
description:
This is just another pirate game. Go to location of an X in a the treasure map, isn't that an original idea?

You need to defeat some ships and creatures during the path but, pirates dont fear anything, just need to know the commands:

  

ARROWS - Right And Left you move between your cannons.

ESPACE - Select, Fire and Fix yours cannons.

You have 3 cannons in your ship, if all these burn, you LOSE!

 

Game did in 5 hours.

 Follow the pirate dev!

TWITTER - TWITCH
